attributes.action: Implement sustainability labelling on food packaging
attributes.additional_details:
There are many factors that affect how sustainable a food product is, meaning there are a variety of ways you could present this information to consumers. To give an idea of how food sustainability labelling might work, I have created 3 different designs that would help consumers make more well informed choices about the food they eat.

Designs and explanations of how they work can be found here: https://www.reddit.com/r/environment/comments/cw39hc/sustainability_labelling_for_food_packaging/
attributes.background: The food we eat has an impact on our planet as well as our health. But when we buy our food, we aren’t given any information about whether a product is bad for the environment or not. Food in the UK has nutritional information printed on it. So why not have sustainability information on it too?
